lastfm.summary: Released in November of 1985, "Burning Heart" was the the main theme from the film Rocky IV. It became Survivor's second biggest hit in the U.S. when it reached #2 on the Billboard Hot 100. The Cold War themed single also reached #5 on the UK Official Charts, #2 in France, and #5 in Germany. At the end of 1986, Billboard Magazine ranked "Burning Heart" as the 8th biggest single of the year in the United States. Read more on Last.fm.
